hero.title: Protect our planet
hero.description: Advanced environmental monitoring system providing real-time data analytics, pollution tracking, and actionable insights to help protect our environment for future generations.

airQuality.title: Real-time Air Quality Monitoring
airQuality.description: Track air quality metrics including PM2.5, PM10, CO2, and other pollutants in real-time with advanced sensor networks and data visualization.

waterQuality.title: Water Quality Analysis
waterQuality.description: Comprehensive water quality monitoring with pH, temperature, dissolved oxygen, and contaminant detection for rivers, lakes, and oceans.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Environmental Insights
aiInsights.description: Machine learning algorithms analyze environmental data to predict trends, identify anomalies, and provide actionable recommendations for environmental protection.

whatIs.question: What is EcoMonitor?
whatIs.answer: EcoMonitor is a software system for real-time environmental monitoring. It collects, processes, and visualizes data from sensors to help track air quality, gas concentration, temperature, and other ecological indicators.

parameters.question: What environmental parameters can be monitored?
parameters.answer: EcoMonitor supports monitoring of air quality indicators such as gas concentration, temperature, humidity, and other sensor-based environmental data depending on the connected devices.

realTime.question: Is the data updated in real time?
realTime.answer: Yes. Sensor data is transmitted to the server in real time or at configurable intervals, ensuring up-to-date information and timely detection of environmental changes.

whoCanUse.question: Who can use EcoMonitor?
whoCanUse.answer: EcoMonitor is designed for individuals, businesses, and organizations that need reliable environmental monitoring, including smart buildings, industrial facilities, and research projects.

security.question: How is data security ensured?
security.answer: All data transmitted through EcoMonitor is securely processed and stored. The system uses encrypted connections and controlled access to protect sensitive environmental and user data.

about.title: About EcoMonitor
about.description: EcoMonitor is a cutting-edge environmental monitoring platform designed to help organizations, governments, and communities track and protect our planet's vital resources. Our advanced sensor networks and AI-powered analytics provide real-time insights into air quality, water conditions, and environmental health, enabling proactive measures to combat pollution and climate change.

howItWorks.title: How It Works Step-by-Step Guide
howItWorks.description: Our comprehensive environmental monitoring system is simple to deploy and use. Follow these four easy steps to start protecting your environment today.

deploy.title: Deploy Sensors
deploy.description: Install our advanced environmental sensors at key monitoring locations. Our IoT devices are weather-resistant and energy-efficient.

collect.title: Collect Data
collect.description: Sensors continuously collect real-time environmental data including air quality, water parameters, temperature, and more.

analyze.title: Analyze & Process
analyze.description: Our AI-powered platform processes the collected data, identifies patterns, and generates actionable insights and reports.

action.title: Take Action
action.description: Receive alerts and recommendations to take proactive measures, ensuring environmental protection and regulatory compliance.

services.title: Professional Services
services.description: Comprehensive environmental monitoring solutions tailored to your needs, from small-scale deployments to enterprise-level sensor networks.

analytics.title: Environmental Data Analytics
analytics.description: Advanced analytics platform that processes millions of data points to identify patterns, trends, and anomalies in environmental conditions, helping you make informed decisions.

management.title: Sensor Network Management
management.description: Comprehensive management system for deploying, monitoring, and maintaining environmental sensor networks across multiple locations with real-time status updates.

detection.title: Pollution Source Detection
detection.description: AI-powered detection system that identifies pollution sources, tracks contamination spread, and provides early warning alerts to prevent environmental disasters.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-time Data Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Monitor air quality, water pollution, and weather conditions with live updates. Our sensors deliver data every 60 seconds for immediate analysis.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Visual Data Intelligence
analytics.description: Transform raw environmental data into actionable insights with interactive charts, trend analysis, and predictive modeling tools.

studentPlan.title: Student Plan
studentPlan.description: Perfect for school projects, university research, and environmental clubs.

alertSystem.title: Smart Alert System
alertSystem.description: Receive instant notifications when environmental parameters exceed safe thresholds. Customizable alerts via email, SMS, or mobile app.
